F

fetch(InputStream) - Static method in class net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher.Fetcher
Copies the content of a given InputStream into a fresh byte[], using byte[] as a buffer of default buffer size of one kibibyte (1024 bytes).
fetch(InputStream, int) - Static method in class net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher.Fetcher
Copies the content of a given InputStream into a fresh byte[], using byte[] as a buffer.
fetch(InputStream, boolean) - Static method in class net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher.Fetcher
Copies the content of a given InputStream into a fresh byte[], using byte[] as a buffer of default buffer size of one kibibyte (1024 bytes).
fetch(InputStream, int, boolean) - Static method in class net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher.Fetcher
Copies the content of a given InputStream into a fresh byte[], using a byte[] as a buffer.
fetch(InputStream, OutputStream) - Static method in class net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher.Fetcher
Copies the content of a given InputStream into a given OutputStream, a buffer of default buffer size of one kibibyte (1024 bytes).
fetch(InputStream, OutputStream, boolean, boolean) - Static method in class net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher.Fetcher
Copies the content of a given InputStream into a given OutputStream, using a buffer of default buffer size of one kibibyte (1024 bytes).
fetch(InputStream, OutputStream, int) - Static method in class net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher.Fetcher
Copies the content of a given InputStream into a given OutputStream, using a byte[] as a buffer.
fetch(InputStream, OutputStream, int, boolean, boolean) - Static method in class net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher.Fetcher
Copies the content of a given InputStream into a given OutputStream, using a byte[] as a buffer.
Fetcher - Class in net.markenwerk.utils.data.fetcher
A convenient replacement for IOUtils.toByteArray() to perform the everyday and menial task of reading an entire InputStream into a byte[] with the method fetch(InputStream).

N
